pkgmetadata.longdescription: Penalized Regression Calibration (PRC) for the Dynamic Prediction of Survival // Computes penalized regression calibration (PRC), a statistical method for the dynamic prediction of survival when many longitudinal predictors are available. PRC is described in Signorelli (2024) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2309.15600 and in Signorelli et al. (2021) doi:10.1002/sim.9178.
